title: Farmers, Trade Association Debate Merits Of Organic Marketing Fund
teaser: Most consumers know the advertising taglines for beef, "it's what's for dinner" and pork, "the other white meat." But so far the fast-growing organic sector hasn't enjoyed such a succinct motto. Now the Organic Trade Association wants growers to help pay for that. The idea is splitting farmers, processors and marketers into factions.
